AAE.caption: Card Added
AAE.doc: Triggered after a card is added.
AAE.name: card_added

AAK.caption: Logo
AAK.doc: Circular logo that appears at the top of the card popup.
AAK.name: logo

AAL.caption: Popup Title
AAL.doc: The title that appears below the logo on the card popup.
AAL.name: popup_title

AAM.caption: Remember User
AAM.doc: Checkbox to determine whether to remember the user
AAM.name: remember_user

AAO.caption: Button Text
AAO.doc: Text of the button on the Stripe checkout popup
AAO.name: button_text

AAP.caption: Popup Description
AAP.doc: Text that appears near the top of the popup, below the brand logo/icon and name
AAP.name: popup_description

AAD.caption: Token
AAD.doc: Card token to be used for saving the card.
AAD.name: token
